website_summaries.verdict: For a Kobe model, the Nike Mamba Focus is just a disappointment on the court. The shoe’s fit, cushioning, and traction are just terrible. The only good things going for these low-top basketball shoes are its premium feeling materials and sleek style.Even though the Mamba focus retails for just a hundred bucks, testers are in agreement that these budget basketball shoes are simply not worth copping. There are other signature shoes near its price point (like the Nike PG3 and Adidas Dame 5) that deliver far better results on the hardwood.
pros: According to most testers, the Nike Mamba Focus’ outsole is quite durable
They claim that these low-top basketball shoes are an excellent outdoor option
Nearly all reviewers note that the stiff midsole is relatively responsive and provides plenty of court feel
Almost all testers agree that the materials are the best feature of the Mamba Focus
According to them, the materials look premium and provide a signature feel
Most players have nothing to complain about the shoe’s support and lockdown
A tester comments that these low-top basketball shoes feel fast and minimal on-feet
Nearly all buyers are digging the shoe’s silhouette
They are claiming that these low-top Nike basketball shoes make for great casual sneakers
cons: Most players are disappointed at the Mamba Focus’ traction
These Nike basketball shoes just can’t get a good bite even when playing on clean courts
The cushioning is almost rock hard, nearly all testers gripe
There is virtually no compression and bounce
A reviewer gripes that the materials look cheap

customer_reviews.title: These beautiful athletic shoes may stay in “mint condition”.
customer_reviews.text: They look more awesome, out of the box. I brought them just before the devastating demise of Kobe Bryant, his beautiful daughter Gianna and their friends and family. May their soul rest in the presence of the lord God Almighty. These athletic shoes may remain in their “out-of-box” condition. Love your family and friends the utmost.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky IT

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! no issues at all so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the shoe. I play basketball competitively and wear out shoes frequently so I recently switched from the Mamba Rages to the Focus. I've seen a few reviews around complaining about the size saying they run big, but they fit me perfectly. A little snug the first couple times but the material allows the flexibility to loosen up around your foot. My only SMALL complaint is the laces. They're a bit short for me and come untied sometimes, but not so frequently that it's an issue. If you've worn mambas in the past and liked them you'll love this shoe, and if you're looking for a slick affordable low top then this would be my rec.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Mamba Mentality while at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these immediately after the news broke. I use them as my weight lifting shoe and they work flawlessly to grip the floor. When you're tired and look down, you're always reminded to go the extra mile and continue to shred. RIP KB/GB
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them! Looks great and is comfortable. He literally walks all day so it’s hard to find shoes that he can tolerate all day. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Drue Crites

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 16 yr old son. He said the shoes are extremely comfortable. Love the color, it is an extremely nice shade of red. These shoes do not appear "girly"
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Not so new!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes had wrinkles in the sole as if they were wore before. If described as new I shouldn’t see wrinkles. Also I’m writing this review right after shipped and opening them. I got these because their Kobe shoes but the description as new upset me when I seen wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: They arrived on time and in good condition
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome and they look awesome. Love my Kobe Bryant shoes 8-24 🙏 R.I.P. Champ
customer_reviews.author: chris fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not the best Kobe shoe I've ever worn, but it does the job. Somewhat stiff, and need a bit of breaking in, but the grip is far superior to other shoes I've owned, even on dirty floors. I do still prefer the Elite 11's. Too bad those are almost impossible to find.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beyond fantastic, exactly as pictured and described. My son wears a 9.5 in men's, so that's what I ordered and they fit perfectly. Came in original shoebox packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Size 15 red Mamba bb shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. My guy loves them. Size 15 is very hard to find so I was lucky to find his size and able to get them fairly quick.

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a men’s size 11 and when the shoes arrived I couldn’t get my foot half way into the shoe. Since the shoe size is not labeled on the shoe, I only have to assume the shoe size isn’t true as said. Aside from that the shoe was very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but sizes slightly large.

customer_reviews.title: I won't purchase this shoe again.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits well and looks great. My problem is the grip. It slid on clean courts. That unacceptable for a new Kobe brand shoe.

customer_reviews.title: the workmanship was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The tread on bottom of shoes was not uniform, and when you were facing the shoe, the red and white line down the center of the sole was crocked.

customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but they are very narrow throughout the width and the inner sole is removable. However, the inner sole takes alot of actual foot space and can be a con for those with wider feet...l totally recommend to go half to full size up if you have wide feet...but they're super cute and the lacing system is very different than your norm...

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Mamba Focus Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: The mamba focus basketball shoe that pays homage to the Kobe bryan Champion offers a dream combination of soft and responsive cushioning. Designs with a light design and a high profile, the upper is made of mesh, to promote breathability, and a rubber sole to increase traction on all surfaces.
